net.jbouchard.bool
Class TruthTable

java.lang.Object
  net.jbouchard.bool.TruthTable

public class TruthTable
extends Object

A truth table of a collection of Boolean expressions and all variables used in the expression.

Version:
0.1 Beta
Author:
Chris Bouchard

Field Summary
private  Collection<BooleanExpression> expressionCollection
          The collection of expressions for which the truth table is to be generated
private  Map<Map<String,Boolean>,Map<BooleanExpression,Boolean>> results
          The map of variable dictionaries to the map of a Boolean expression to it's result when that expression is evaluated for that dictionary.
private  List<Map<String,Boolean>> resultsKeyList
          The list of dictionaries in the proper order so that the rows of variables in the truth table count as binary numbers when displayed
private  List<String> variablesList
          The list of variables in the proper order so that the rows of variables in the truth table count as binary numbers when displayed
 
Constructor Summary
TruthTable(BooleanExpression expression)
          Construct a truth table from the given Boolean expression.
TruthTable(Collection<BooleanExpression> expressionCollection)
          Construct a truth table from the given collection of Boolean expressions.
TruthTable(String str)
          Construct a truth table from a BooleanExpression created from the given string.
 
Method Summary
private  List<Map<String,Boolean>> buildDictionary(List<String> vars)
          Return a list of dictionaries of all possible combinations of the given list of variables in the proper order so that the rows of variables in the truth table count as binary numbers when displayed.
 String toString()
          Return a string representation of this truth table.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

expressionCollection

private final Collection<BooleanExpression> expressionCollection
The collection of expressions for which the truth table is to be generated

results

private final Map<Map<String,Boolean>,Map<BooleanExpression,Boolean>> results
The map of variable dictionaries to the map of a Boolean expression to it's result when that expression is evaluated for that dictionary. A dictionary is a map of string names of variables to their boolean truth value

resultsKeyList

private final List<Map<String,Boolean>> resultsKeyList
The list of dictionaries in the proper order so that the rows of variables in the truth table count as binary numbers when displayed

variablesList

private final List<String> variablesList
The list of variables in the proper order so that the rows of variables in the truth table count as binary numbers when displayed

Constructor Detail

TruthTable

public TruthTable(BooleanExpression expression)
           throws ParseException
Construct a truth table from the given Boolean expression.

Parameters:
expression - the Boolean expression for which to construct this truth table
Throws:
ParseException - if the Boolean expression is not properly formatted

TruthTable

public TruthTable(Collection<BooleanExpression> expressionCollection)
           throws ParseException
Construct a truth table from the given collection of Boolean expressions.

Parameters:
expressionCollection - the collection of Boolean expressions for which to construct this truth table
Throws:
ParseException - if any of the Boolean expressions is not properly formatted

TruthTable

public TruthTable(String str)
           throws ParseException
Construct a truth table from a BooleanExpression created from the given string.

Parameters:
str - the string representing the Boolean expression for which to construct this truth table
Throws:
ParseException - if the boolean expression is not properly formatted
Method Detail

toString

public String toString()
Return a string representation of this truth table.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
a string representation of this truth table

buildDictionary

private List<Map<String,Boolean>> buildDictionary(List<String> vars)
Return a list of dictionaries of all possible combinations of the given list of variables in the proper order so that the rows of variables in the truth table count as binary numbers when displayed.

Parameters:
vars - the list of variables for which to create dictionaries
Returns:
the list of dictionaries
